title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Increased assignee limit for issues and pull requests to 10, removing distinctions between public/private repositories and paid/free plans.
Added commit authors to the list of users with permissions to resolve secret scanning alerts.
summary:
- Increased assignee limit for issues and pull requests to 10, removing distinctions between public/private repositories and paid/free plans.
- Added commit authors to the list of users with permissions to resolve secret scanning alerts.
generated_title: Increase assignee limit and expand secret scanning permissions

**8aa9b61**: Add commit authors to list of users with perms for resolving secret scanning alerts (#58042) (by Prashanth Kannan)
original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Increased assignee limit for issues and pull requests to 10, removing distinctions between public/private repositories and paid/free plans.
- Added commit authors to the list of users with permissions to resolve secret scanning alerts.

### Title  
Increase assignee limit and expand secret scanning permissions
